blogPost.excerpt: Add OAuth integrations to your Bubble.io app instantly with no-code plugins built by Pathfix. Pathfix plugins handle the entire OAuth process and gives you instant access to provider Actions, without API or endpoint complexity.
blogPost.body: Add OAuth integrations to your Bubble.io app instantly with no-code plugins built by Pathfix. Pathfix plugins handle the entire OAuth process and gives you instant access to provider Actions, without API or endpoint complexity.
blogPost.title: Bubble Integration Plugins by Pathfix - Add OAuth integrations to your Bubble.io app, instantly
blogPost.author: Kevin William David

localize.description: 通过Pathfix构建的无代码插件，可以立即为你的Bubble.io应用添加OAuth集成。Pathfix插件处理整个OAuth过程，并让你立即访问提供者的行为，没有API或终端的复杂性。
localize.tagline: 将OAuth集成到你的Bubble.io应用中，即刻就能实现。

localize.description: 通過Pathfix構建的無代碼插件，可以立即爲你的Bubble.io應用添加OAuth集成。Pathfix插件處理整個OAuth過程，並讓你立即訪問提供者的行爲，沒有API或終端的複雜性。
localize.tagline: 將OAuth集成到你的Bubble.io應用中，即刻就能實現。

previous.excerpt: Imitate lets you practice pronunciation with real-life videos from youtube, and lets you listen to your own recordings to have an instant feedback loop.
previous.title: Imitate - Learn French pronunciation with real-life videos

localize.description: Imitate可以让你用youtube上的真人视频来练习发音，并让你听自己的录音，有一个即时的反馈循环。
localize.tagline: 通过真人视频学习法语发音。

localize.description: Imitate可以讓你用youtube上的真人視頻來練習發音，並讓你聽自己的錄音，有一個即時的反饋循環。
localize.tagline: 通過真人視頻學習法語發音。
